name: SQUARE38 - 1000x Speed of Light
description:
This OBJKT is a sped up version of the original real time version of SPEED OF LIGHT 2021.001 as published on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ns_drmRY-Ew

Not raging with a staggering 299,792,458 meters per second, but crawling ultra slowly across the absorbing and reflecting surface. The movement of the shadows: the speed of light as we observe it in real time.

The intention of the YouTube video is to display it on a high definition tv screen. Watch it change as an ultra slow artwork in motion. The OBJEKT NFT is a great piece to collect too. Obviously.
